MetaSubjectEntity.Name: FANUC M-710IC
MetaSubjectEntity.Definition: A specific industrial robot model produced by FANUC.. A medium-sized handling robot capable of carrying loads from 12kg to 70kg.

SubjectEntity_1.Name: RobotArm
SubjectEntity_1.Definition: The main arm of the robot responsible for movement.

MethodEntity_1.Name: MoveToPosition
MethodEntity_1.Definition: Method to command the robot arm to move to a specific position.

MethodEntity_2.Name: Calibrate
MethodEntity_2.Definition: Method to calibrate the robot arm for accurate positioning.

SubjectEntity_2.Name: Controller
SubjectEntity_2.Definition: The central control unit of the robot.

MethodEntity_3.Name: Start
MethodEntity_3.Definition: Method to start the robot operation.

MethodEntity_4.Name: Stop
MethodEntity_4.Definition: Method to stop the robot operation.

ObjectEntity_1.Name: Load Capacity
ObjectEntity_1.Definition: The range of loads that the robot can carry
ObjectEntity_1.Reason: The 'Load Capacity' is a characteristic specific to the 'FANUC M-710IC' robot.

ObjectEntity_2.Name: Axis
ObjectEntity_2.Definition: The number of axes the robot operates on
ObjectEntity_2.Reason: The 'Axis' is a feature related to the configuration of the 'FANUC M-710IC' robot.

ObjectEntity_4.Name: Handling System Capacity
ObjectEntity_4.Definition: The maximum load capacity of the handling system
ObjectEntity_4.Reason: The 'Handling System Capacity' is a parameter specific to the 'FANUC M-710IC' robot.

ObjectEntity_5.Name: Environmental Resistance
ObjectEntity_5.Definition: The level of environmental resistance of the robot
ObjectEntity_5.Reason: The 'Environmental Resistance' is a characteristic unique to the 'FANUC M-710IC' robot.

ObjectEntity_2.Name: Installation
ObjectEntity_2.Definition: The installation options for the robot
ObjectEntity_2.Reason: The 'Installation' details are specific to the 'FANUC M-710IC' robot model.

ObjectEntity_3.Name: Suitability
ObjectEntity_3.Definition: The suitability of the robot for high-speed handling
ObjectEntity_3.Reason: The 'Suitability' information is relevant to the performance of the 'FANUC M-710IC' robot.

ObjectEntity_4.Name: Compact System
ObjectEntity_4.Definition: The capability of the robot to enable the construction of a compact handling system
ObjectEntity_4.Reason: The 'Compact System' feature is specific to the design of the 'FANUC M-710IC' robot.
